author: ceki
msg: Schduler is now pretty heavily tested.
Events can be scheduled and scheduled events can be deleted.

author: ceki
msg: - Added the "isPristine" falg to LoggerRepository. As soon as a configurator
starts configuring a repository this flag is set to false.

author: ceki
msg: Started work on a global task scheduler. It will allow multiple watchdogs
to share a single scheduler thread. Work in progress.

author: ceki
msg: - Removed support for the deprecated property "log4j.configDebug". [**/D]
